name: predictive-memory
description: Generates predictions and classifications using a hierarchical sequence/object cache

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test:unit && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:e2e: npm run test:e2e:predictor && npm run test:e2e:classifier
scripts.build: npm run test:unit && node package.js && npm run lint
